name: Titanium
description:
Titanium is my first "complex" game built.

It is a quick and short game created during my University Degree. 

It is a platformer where player is sent by a military agency (Central) to find what is happening in the sewers. Themed in a cyberpunk city and toxic underground places, you will fight against an evil corportaion to find out what is happening.

Movement: arrows

Attack: D (you can deflect enemy bullets if hit them right on time)

I hope you like it. Github repository is public for everyone to take a look:

https://github.com/johhaanndev/PEC4-Titanium
